trends: There have been 26 other sightings in New Orleans
There were no other sightings in New Orleans on or around November 13th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was thinking about going to the po boy festival today and so checked the french quarter cam at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg) to see what the weather was like. there was a large object floating in the sky just beyond rampart st. at first i thought the cam was malfunctioning and was somehow "freezing" the picture. i thought that perhaps it was a helicopter frozen in flight, but then i could see cars moving along rampart. you know how it is...i just sat there and stared at the screen. the thing must have been making some movement because sometimes i could see light glint off of it. after a few minutes, i realized that there was more than one stationary object in the sky, but they were much farther off. i went to the mississippi bridge cam to see if i could see more of them but there were none visible in that direction. when i returned to the fq cam, the large object was gone and only one of the smaller (or farther) objects remained. i just checked; it is still there: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). look to the right of the building on the left. was the larger object the goodyear blimp? this is a festival day in nola. but how could it have disappeared so quickly? i then went to mufon to see if anybody else had reported from nola and when nobody had, i decided to report in spite of not being there.
Summary: Silvery flattened oval seen stationary 10 min over French Quarter on FQ cam; later disappeared.
